E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 8/11/1975
Subject: Progress of Darryl Jones
Dear Sir,
Darryl Jones has nothing more to prove at AA San Antonio Brewers!
He has an AVG of .284 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 8/14/1975
Subject: Roberto Mendez healing process
Roberto Mendez is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
